infos.title: New Update System
texts: This dialog helps you to not miss any new features when Puppeteer updates

infos.title: New features
texts: - Colonist Bar contains visual connection status and last command issued
- Right click in the Colonist Bar now shows an assignment menu
- Settings! You can now configure Puppeteer in the Mod Settings

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Puppet Announcer now always on top. That makes it compatible with Dubs Mini Map
- Viewers are no longer automatically unassigned

infos.title: New features
texts: - New connection indicator that shows possible network congestions

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Puppet head does not get stuck anymore
- Communication runs now in a background thread to avoid network congestions
- Less risk for internal concurreny that leads to undefined state
- Better rendering of the static in the colonist bar

infos.title: Create new colonists
texts: You can now spawn new Colonists that are automatically assigned to a viewer with the new button in the top right corner of the screen. If you have Prepare Carefully, you can even add cloth and weapons

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Connection indicator scale expanded
- Connection indicator shows average send time for slow connections
- Colonist bar spacing with multiple rows

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Position of Add Colonist button now stable
- Add Colonist button only shows connected viewers
- Showing stalled connection for viewers

infos.title: New server
texts: Using a new server that is less limited

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Sends hello correctly
- Let assignment menu only show connected viewers
- Marks new viewers in the menu

infos.title: Secure Connection
texts: The puppeteer mod now uses a secure websocket connection powered by CloudFlare

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Reverted back to not using CloudFlare for websockets
- Removes the flicker when you have multiple maps
- Reduced some red errors
- Moved the UX down when debug menu shows

infos.title: New Features
texts: Right clicking on the web map show context menu!
Backstory, incapabilities and traits are shown
Web map can be moved and sized with mouse

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Less flickering with multiple maps

infos.title: New Features
texts: Full graphical map!

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: Optimized data size for map transfer
Fixed javascript errors when zooming map

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: Improves the map rendering

infos.title: Map updates
texts: - Map updates are now requested, not pushed from the game
- Map settings

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Fix right-click commands on a second map tile
- More web-map handling improvements
- Html characters in the interface
- Allow only equipable weapons and apparel that fits
- Moved colonist to first row of schedule and priorities
- Adds game time and date

infos.title: Select things on the map
texts: You can now select things on the web map. You will get the same actions as in the game. Selecting an action will work as usual.

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Mobile browser can use map again
- Improved performance for browsers

infos.title: Viewer Restrictions!
texts: There is a new type of zone that contains sets of restrictions - which are lists of forbidden actions

infos.title: Remote Action Log!
texts: All action and changes that a viewer causes will now be logged in the colonists log

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Grow Zones caused error, fixed

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Update site when colonist become temporarily unavailable
- Reconnect after colonist become temporarily unavailable
- Added help texts for restriction zones
- An empty zone will cover the whole map
- New restrictions are active as default
- Connection numbers were scrambled
- No more error when unrestricting zone
- Apply all patches earlier for more compatibility

infos.title: More control
texts: Viewers no can set outfit and drug policies

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Improved general stability
- Support for Camera+ pawn rendering

infos.title: Official 1.0
texts: After a lot of testing, it is time to declare this version 1.0

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - Support missing royalty dlc
- Do not show/select things that are undiscovered

infos.title: Twitch Toolkit Integration
texts: You can now interact with Twitch Toolkit from your Puppeteer browser and leave chat for chatting!

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - fixes capitalisation of twitch names
- Other bug fixes and improvements too hard to describe

infos.title: Colonist Customisation
texts: As a viewer you can now change the basic look of your colonist: Gender, Body Type, Hair Style, Skin & Hair Color!

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - fixes a bug where base information was not send if Twitch Toolkit was not installed (Puppeteer never requires it)
- more defensive coding to be more compatible with other mods (Puppeteer works best at the bottom of your mod list)

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - fixes a bug with integration of the new Twitch Toolkit version

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: - fixes a bug with not sending basic game info without assignment (no toolkit ux on queue screen)

infos.title: Twitch Toolkit Auto Complete
texts: The input field for the Toolkit integration now does auto compete for items and commands

infos.title: Improvements
texts: Restriction zones rendering now uses a simple color pattern and is much faster for larger areas. Also compatible with Linux and macOS.

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: Make new colonists assignable in Puppeteer if they got converted instead of spawned (prisoners etc)

infos.title: Bug fixes
texts: Fixes a bug where wildlife would not spawn and throw errors

infos.title: Controlled colonists will respawn!
texts: Build a puppeteer respawn portal and controlled colonists will automatically respawn when they die!
